name: Cosmic Ark
description: The Cosmic Ark races to bring back creatures from distant planets. The awesome Ark glides through alien space. Foes attack from every side. Destroy them - or be blasted! Reach strange and distant worlds. Send a satellite to capture the skittish beasties in your tractor beam. They may duck away. Keep trying! Transport them to the Ark before another foreign horde attacks. Your mission - to seek and save.
